body:
0.15.x is no longer maintained and only receives critical bug fixes: https://bitcoincore.org/en/lifecycle/#schedule

Closing.

Thanks

Ismail

Pada tanggal Jum, 2 Nov 2018 07:18 xialialia <notifications@github.com
